description: Some 63% support making sexual orientation and sexual identity discrimination illegal.
title: Switzerland votes in favour of LGBT protection bill
title_page: Switzerland votes in favour of LGBT protection bill - BBC News
maintext: "We just want to be free to say: 'Ok, we want to privilege the marriage of a man and a woman.' And we don't want to be at risk if we share this opinion, and treat other couples in a different way."
